about_the_game:
Overview

Welcome to End of Everything, an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic Earth. In this immersive and challenging world, you must navigate through diverse environments, scavenge for resources, build shelters, and defend yourself against zombies, hostile survivors, and alien invasions.

The world has changed, and only the strongest will survive. Whether you are battling the elements, crafting essential tools, or constructing fortified bases, your survival depends on your wits and strategy.

Key Features

  • Survival Mechanics: Manage health, food, water, and stamina to stay alive. Face environmental hazards and adapt to changing weather conditions and day/night cycles.
  • Scavenging: Explore abandoned towns, forests, and mountains to gather vital resources. Search for food, water, weapons, and crafting materials.
  • Building: Construct shelters, fortifications, and crafting stations. Develop your base to defend against enemies and create a safe haven for your team.
  • Combat: Engage in intense melee and ranged combat. Fight against zombies, alien invaders, and hostile survivors with a variety of weapons and tactics.
  • Crafting: Create tools, weapons, and items from collected materials. Master advanced crafting to develop specialized equipment for survival.
  • Dynamic Events: Experience alien invasions, severe weather events, and limited-time challenges that offer unique rewards and test your survival skills.
  • Character Progression: Develop your character with a progression system that allows for skill specialization, unlockable abilities, and unique perks.
  • Immersive World: Explore a richly detailed, post-apocalyptic Earth with varied environments, dynamic weather effects, and strategic locations to discover.
Prepare yourself for the ultimate survival experience. Can you and your friends withstand the Apocalypse and create a new world from the ashes? Join us in End of Everything and find out.

content_descriptors.notes:
Apocalypse Survival Sandbox includes mature content that players should be aware of:

Violence: The game features frequent depictions of realistic violence, including blood, bodily injury, and death. Players engage in combat with zombies, alien invaders, and hostile survivors using melee and ranged weapons.

Horror Elements: Expect very frightening scenes and psychological horror, creating a tense atmosphere.

Language: There's occasional mild profanity, swearing, and cursing throughout the game, with some moderate crude language and occasional swearing.

Mature Themes: The storyline and gameplay involve survival in a harsh post-apocalyptic world, which includes environmental hazards and severe weather conditions.

Legal Drugs: The game includes implied use of alcohol or tobacco, as well as the use of alcohol or tobacco and the use of medical drugs in an unapproved manner.
